title: The Human body: the making of the TV series [DVD]
creator_credit: Liesel Evans, Learning Channel and BBC
brief_description: The final episode in “The Human body” series takes the viewer on a fascinating journey behind how the series was created and how they were able to create the impressive special effects. Presented by Robert Winston.
